reviews.review: I like this game! htis game is so good!

This game changed my life. I remember going to the bottle after I lost my job. My wife. My child. I didn't know what to do. I went on a rampage psychologically and ruined everything. Then I found this game. I understood everything about life. What is the meaning of it. How to cure mental illness. Cancer research. This was the most blessed game I have ever played. Thank you lord for giving me the opportunity to recover.

you pretty much point at the bad guys and click. i'm an exceptional gamer so it was no problem for me. but yeah, it's boring to top frag everytime, valve should've made a harder game like roblox:go instead just saying
edit: i stopped playing against bots and now the game is much better
